TopicTitle: Which features do you want in 0.22?

Articles.Content:
MOAR ERMAHGERD PLERNERTS!!!

I've always kind of felt like having resources would make it feel like Starcraft. "SPAWN MORE OVERLORDS." Though I guess I can see why people might want it. But we don't have to mine on the moon to keep doing space travel, so why should they *shrugs*

Edited July 25, 2013 by FleetAdmiralJ
More meaningful EVA functions. It'd be great if EVA kerbals could assist in station construction.

MOAR PLANETS

I've always kind of felt like having resources would make it feel like Starcraft. "SPAWN MORE OVERLORDS." Though I guess I can see why people might want it. But we don't have to mine on the moon to keep doing space travel, so why should they *shrugs*

No one is asking for resources in the since of must get more resources to keep playing

We're asking for resources just Kethane just more complex and scientific, so that when we go to the moon we don't have to pack all the fuel to get back we can get some while we're there. But that's a so we don't HAVE to, if you choose to pack all that fuel then you can completely ignore the resources system.

I voted for Resources cuz I'm really looking forward to the and improved IVA cuz I like to roleplay, though IVA is definitely lower priority to me than Resources, it's higher than the rest of the features.

MOAR ERMAHGERD PLERNERTS!!!

I've always kind of felt like having resources would make it feel like Starcraft. "SPAWN MORE OVERLORDS." Though I guess I can see why people might want it. But we don't have to mine on the moon to keep doing space travel, so why should they *shrugs*

Um if we want to truly explore and colonize and live in space... we will need to mine the Moon and Mars and the asteroids... and anywhere else we go. The Kerbals will need to as well.

Resources and carreer-mode would come together cause you can get missions to find resources.

Also I would like joystick controls add so I could fly the rockets, planes with like Flight controls.

Official integration of more plugins, such as http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/38285-0-20-x-Subassembly-Manager and http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/38768-0-21-Editor-Extensions-v0-5-24-July-%28EdTools-Editor-Tools-replacement

Improved aerodynamics

Tweakable parts in editor (changing fuel tank ratios, changing default states of things like engine gimbals)

EVA strut placement!

Add IVA models for the Mk2 and Mk3 cockpits

Achievements! I normally don't really care about achievements in other games, but I think they could work quite well in KSP to add some sort of built-in objectives without making progress too structured

Edited July 25, 2013 by zarakon

Resources and clouds/weather on planets. Resources add a whole new objective to the game and the weather/clouds on planets would add a really cool aspect of realism to the game and maybe they could long lasting smoke trails or at launch have the exhaust come out the sides of the launchpad where the exhaust is redirected.

I'd like some environment changes, like weather and clouds and stuff. I don't want career mode at all, and I don't want a resources system yet because Kethane fills the void for me, so really it's just weather. I can picture Eve becoming way cooler-looking.

- More terrain detail and features on the planets/moons

- Volumetric clouds and weather systems

I can dream, can't I?
A countdown would be nice. Without having to do it myself :/

I would love to see some sort of mission control/support like the real missions do. They could allow it so that mission control could warn you about fuel levels, impending crashes and communicating with the kerbals on-board. I think that it would be pretty cool!

EVA strut placement!

That's actually very usefull now I'm thinking about it...
Hmmm, "Improved IVA" is more popular then "Clouds and weather" and "More celestial bodies"...
Resources and career. But, currently playing 2.1.1 in vanilla and I really would like a few different space station modules.
Resources, more crew management and at least one new planet. Or at least beginnings of asteroid belt - 5 or 6 rocks half the size of Gilly, on eccentric inclined orbits.
Ressource + Carreer mode.

All I care is for rovers to have more of a purpose.

Another feature I would love to see, and actually would be cool if it was a mod, the ability to turn off certain nameplates. An example is using MechJeb to land at my Duna Base. I'm scared I'm going to land ontop on one of my habitation modules.

Thinking of using Hooligan Labs' landing pad. But I want it to be near to my base. By turning off all of the nametags except the landing pad, I'll be able to land perfectly.

Edited July 26, 2013 by Benie
I'd personally like "MOAR SCIENCE", but resources and another cool little career update would feed my space hunger.
...is this poll seriously already closed after a day of being open, or is there just some mechanic on this forum that prevents users without large numbers of posts from voting?

Hmmm, "Improved IVA" is more popular then "Clouds and weather" and "More celestial bodies"...

clouds and weather some people are probably worried would cause more lag, and new celestial bodies don't have a use right now until the gameplay is more fleshed out, even if it was it's only something top level experts would be able to use, but IVA's on the other hand is something everyone can use.

Resources for me, please.

I don't even know what career mode is and why I would want it.

...is this poll seriously already closed after a day of being open, or is there just some mechanic on this forum that prevents users without large numbers of posts from voting?

You probably need to be in the "Curious George" set of users, which requires you to have at least 5 posts. So go get one more somewhere and come back and see if you can vote. I believe this is put in place to keep people from changing pole outcomes with multiple accounts.
I want all the things. IVA is the least important, though.

Reentry Heat (that is, physical effects on your spaceship, not only visuals) and Flight Protocols (which may be accessible in an archive after recovery or termination of the flight.

I think the closest fitting options in your poll to these 2 are "Improved Aerodynamics" and "Working on the Career Mode"

I think CAREER MODE is the thing that would really get me back to game, since I would have goal, because now its pointless to land on moon if you dont need to or you can buy every part of ship in the game and not spend some kerbalcoins to purchase them.
